attributes.action: Allow children over the age of 16, who no longer see their parents, to legally dissown their family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 17 and do not see my family and do not wish to see them again, yet I am stuck with my last name and if I wanted to change it I would have to pay!! I think this is most unfair after all I have been through I think it should be legal to dissown your parents and family meaning they are to have NO contact and are asked to stay away!!
